content.question: Consider a system of two objects and Earth. Object <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and object <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are held together by a light string as shown in the figure. <math alttext="M sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is larger than <math alttext="M sub X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The two-object system is released from rest in the orientation shown in the figure at a height <math alttext="H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> above Earth’s surface. The change in the kinetic energy of the system from when it is released to the instant it hits the ground is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="M sub Y, times g H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="M sub X, times g H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, M sub Y minus M sub X, close parenthesis, times g H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, M sub Y plus M sub X, close parenthesis, times g H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, M sub Y plus M sub X, close parenthesis, times g H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>g</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
